thread.title: Mozilla Bug Tracker Hacked, Data About Firefox Vulnerabilities Stolen - newsR
thread.title_full: Mozilla Bug Tracker Hacked, Data About Firefox Vulnerabilities Stolen - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Mozilla Bug Tracker Hacked, Data About Firefox Vulnerabilities Stolen - newsR
text: Mozilla engineers have revealed that their bug tracking application was compromised, and an unknown attacker had accessed a privileged account which had access to sensitive information about unpatched Firefox vulnerabilities. According to the foundation's security disclosure, they confirmed the attacker had access to the bug tracker since September 201... Â»
